name: ​Icarus Ascension
description:
Icarus Ascension

PLAY OUR GAME HERE:
ICARUS GAME
Best if played on PC/Windows.

A game produced using Construct 2 platform.
It´s a remake of shoot'n'up asteroids inspired on Asteroids (Atari) and Stardust (AMIGA).

Icarus Ascension is our grade academic project that we are producing for 
FATEC Carapicuiba, São Paulo, Brasil - 2018.

Client: FATEC Carapicuiba (academic project)
Art director: João Carlos Botelho Ferraz
Studio: Quad studio
Designer/Illustrator: João Carlos Botelho Ferraz
Script: João Carlos Botelho Ferraz
Coder: Jonathan Pereira da Silva
Assistant coder: Cristiane Jade de Morais Santana
Game designer: Cristiane Jade de Morais Santana
Sound designer: Jonathan Pereira
Colaborators: Marcelo Leopoldino | Mariana Dotta

Below you can interact with our cool space ship Icarus!
